Title: Relates to administering a COVID-19 vaccine
Summary: Requires a COVID-19 vaccine to be administered in accordance with the department of health's COVID-19 vaccination administration program and mandates vaccination in certain situations.
LawCode: Add Art 21 Title 8 ยง2178, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to administering a COVID-19 vaccine
